attributes.action: Stop motorway service area shops from overcharging
attributes.additional_details:
Shops  and petrol filling stations on motorway service areas  appear to overcharge by  excessive amounts.

This tends to make drivers reluctant to stop  at these service areas, even when they are tired  and need a break.

Therefore please  prohibit   the retailers at motorway service areas from  overcharging for fuel   and snacks etc.
